title: Picture in your mind
creator_credit: Philip Stapp, Julien Bryan, McGraw-Hill Films and International Film Foundation
brief_description: Philip Stapp’s sequel to “Boundary Lines” (001397), with a special score by Gene Forell. This film shows the background and growth of prejudice, from the dawn of mankind. It indicates the responsibility of the individual for a better world. Animated, inventive and evocative. Spoken by Walter Abel.
